name: Emotica
description:
Emotica was co-designed by Anna Anthropy and Leon Arnott, and programmed by Leon Arnott. Your game world is automatically saved to Emotica_World.json.

Older versions are linked below. Emotica Online: The previous version, with the scripting panel. You can find the source code online. Emotica Prototype: The original game, not editable. Windows only, contains cusswords.
